title: Moz - SEO Software for Smarter MarketingMoz logoMenu openMenu closeSearchMoz logo
description: Backed by the largest community of SEOs on the planet, Moz builds the tools that make SEO, content marketing, market research, digital PR, and local SEO easy. Start your free 30-day trial today!
content: Trusted by 500,000+ brands and agencies Your SEO & digital marketing solutions SEO SEO at Scale Content Marketing Digital PR Local Marketing Custom Data SEO SEO at Scale Content Marketing suggestions that resonate with your audienceLeverage keyword data to build a content strategy that fuels organic growthEasily prioritize tasks that drive impactful results Try Moz Pro free or sign up relation prospecting opportunities that are aligned with your goalsIdentify existing irrelevant and low-quality backlinks, and opportunities to replace themMonitor the PR metrics that matter and adapt make impactful decisions Get free listing score or sign up now Supercharge your own tools and dashboards with leading SEO metrics via the Moz API Track and analyze your brand’s, clients’, and competitors’ websites at scaleBuild or enhance custom tools and dashboards with Moz’s proprietary data, including 44.8 trillion current linksAppraise brand strength and identify gaps to build a winning marketing and PR strategyLeverage data to quickly prospect and research large market segments Try Moz API free or sign up now NEW at Moz: Announcing the Moz Affiliate Program Unlock a new stream of earning potential with the NEW Moz Affiliate Program! As a Moz affiliate, you'll have the opportunity to promote the Moz tools you love and earn commissions on every sale you generate. Share your passion for digital marketing and the tools that make your life easier to diversify your income. We can’t wait to partner with you! Become a Moz Affiliate Learn more about Moz tools Moz Pro: the all-in-one SEO toolkit Moz Pro is the do-it-all SEO solution to help you rank higher, drive qualified traffic to your website, and run high-impact SEO campaigns. Explore Moz Pro Keyword Research Discover thousands of keywords to target along with Keyword Difficulty scores, accurate search volumes, and SERP analysis. Learn more Competitive Research Identify competitors, keyword gaps, and link opportunities to improve organic share of voice and surpass your competitors. Learn more Link Research Get insight into any website’s authority and link profile in seconds, including linking domains, most valuable pages, anchor text, and Domain Authority. Learn more Rank Tracking Track the performance of hundreds (or thousands) of keywords across 170+ search engines. Learn more Domain Overview Get a quick SEO snapshot dashboard for any domain. Gain measurable insight with metrics like Brand Authority and Domain Authority, along with ranking keywords and top backlinks. Learn more Site Crawl Audit your site to find and diagnose technical SEO issues that may hurt your organic search rankings. Make sure your site is optimized with actionable recommendations. Learn more Explore Moz Pro STAT: the ultimate large-scale rank tracking platform Whether you’re juggling multiple sites, millions of pages, or just a ton of keywords, STAT helps you unlock new opportunities, drive more revenue, and prove the value of your SEO efforts. Daily analytics at scale Get everything the 100-result SERP has to offer (plus its full HTML) in any location, on desktop and mobile, every day, for keyword counts that start in the thousands. Market visibility Outrank rivals and grow your market presence with powerful share of voice metrics and robust competitor tracking. Know who you’re up against and how you compare. SERP feature insights See exactly which SERP features appear in your space, and how much visibility they drive, so you can create the right content for the right keywords. Customizable segments Understand your data from any angle. Group keywords into custom segments – no matter how granular – to surface precision insights for data-driven decisions. Flexible reporting Take your SERP data to go with one-click CSV reports, handy APIs, and pre-built Looker Studio connectors to fuel deep analysis and ambitious experimentation. Explore STAT Moz Local: the local SEO and reputation management tool Whether you have one location or 10,000, manage business listings and reviews, report on performance and sentiment, and post to social media all from one easy-to-use platform. Business listings management Seamlessly create and manage your local business listings on Google, Facebook, and other relevant directories to help consumers find and choose your business(es) directly from Moz Local. Review management Monitor, read, and respond to customer reviews on multiple sites from a single dashboard. Easily share news and offers Engage your audience and customers online with business news and promotional updates via directories and social platforms. Monitor and report on performance Show off your results with ease. Share the Visibility Index, sentiment, and online presence score reports with your teams and clients to keep them up to speed on current performance. Managed clients also benefit from advanced analytics and API access. Explore Moz Local Moz API: powering custom data solutions Moz’s proprietary metrics have helped shape the SEO industry since 2004. Plug into the Moz API to build or enhance your custom data tools and dashboards. Domain Authority Predict the ranking power of link signals to a website with the original authority metric developed by Moz. Often imitated, never replicated. Page Authority Predict how well a specific page will rank in search results based on linking factors. Brand Authority Measure brand strength at scale for thousands of sites at a time with Brand Authority, a revolutionary metric that measures a website’s brand strength on a scale of one to 100. Spam Score Assess the level of risk of links from specific subdomains with Spam Score, a Moz metric that represents the percentage of sites with similar features that have been penalized or banned by Google. In-depth link data Understand the competitive landscape and power your link-building campaigns by accessing detailed link counts, link propensity scores, anchor text strings, and inbound links to a page. Explore Moz API or discover custom data solutions Propel your business forward with Moz Data 1.25 billionKeyword suggestions in Keyword Explorer Explore keywords 44.8 trillionLinks indexed by Link Explorer Check Domain Authority 100,000Local business listings optimized with Moz Local Check local presence 8 millionSERPs analyzed daily by STAT Book a demo Why marketers trust Moz Data & tools Brian Gorman VP of SEO at Go Fish Digital “We have to prove the value of our work for enterprise clients. We can’t make decisions arbitrarily. They care about metrics, they care that our actions are backed by data, and they care about proof. STAT is great for that.” Sean Pomory Digital Media Specialist at Chesapeake Regional Healthcare "Our Google Business Profile traffic has increased drastically over the past three years. Before we started this partnership with Moz, we were averaging about 30,000 views each month from local search. Now, it’s well over 200,000. Moz Local is the perfect solution for us.” Alex Bruner Founder at Intellitonic "Presenting to clients is always challenging. Moz makes our team more effective when sharing data with clients, because everything is encapsulated in one dashboard. Moz has a lot of capacities to help clean up our data and present it in ways that are meaningful for clients, but still have the technical depth." Laura Simis Director of Marketing at Hum “We've been using Moz Pro since 2012, and it is the ONLY piece of software that makes the cut time and time again. It brings so much to the table for a smaller team that has to do a little bit of everything.” Jason Nurmi Sr. Marketing Manager at Zillow "Moz Pro gives us the data we need to justify our projects and strategies. It helps us track the ROI of our efforts and brings significant transparency to our industry."
